SUMMARY: Iran's state media say an Italian journalist has been arrested on charges of violating the Islamic Republic's laws

TITLE: Russian missile and drone attack on Ukraine hits multiple targets, including Kyiv
SUMMARY: Russia launched an aerial attack on Ukraine, striking the capital and other regions with multiple missiles and drones

TITLE: Militants attack a security post in restive northwest Pakistan, killing 2 people
SUMMARY: Militants armed with assault rifles attacked a security post in restive northwest Pakistan, killing a police officer and a civilian before fleeing the scene

TITLE: A Swiss flight attendant dies a week after emergency landing due to smoke
SUMMARY: A flight attendant aboard a Swiss aircraft that made an emergency landing in Austria due to smoke in the cabin has died

TITLE: Scholz calls on Germans to unite in solidarity in a new year despite many crises
SUMMARY: Chancellor Olaf Scholz has called on Germany’s 84 million residents to stick together despite the many global crises and wars, the country’s ailing economy and a deadly Christmas market attack

TITLE: Wind, rain and the threat of floods play the spoiler for UK's New Year's festivities
SUMMARY: Revelers in the U.K. may have to wring themselves out as they ring in the New Year

TITLE: Nearly all of Puerto Rico is without power on New Year's Eve
SUMMARY: A blackout has hit nearly all of Puerto Rico as the U.S. territory prepares to celebrate New Year’s Eve

TITLE: With marathon a day throughout 2024, this Belgian runner has Guinness world record within her grasp
SUMMARY: Belgian ultra runner Hilde Dosogne feels she has done all it takes to become the first woman to run a marathon every single day of the year

TITLE: US and Boeing investigators examine the site of a deadly South Korean plane crash
SUMMARY: A team of U.S. investigators including representatives from Boeing have examined the site of a plane crash that killed 179 people in South Korea

TITLE: Berlin police say they have detained a man who attacked 2 people with a knife
SUMMARY: Berlin police say they have detained a man who attacked and injured two people in the city’s Charlottenburg neighborhood, further jolting Germany days after a deadly Christmas market attack elsewhere in the country

TITLE: Zimbabwe abolishes death penalty almost 20 years after its last hanging
SUMMARY: Zimbabwe has abolished the death penalty, a widely expected move in a country that last carried out the punishment nearly two decades ago

TITLE: Thief swipes $13 million in jewels, handbags, cash from London mansion
SUMMARY: Police in London search for a burglar who broke into an occupied mansion.
